name: TaleX
description: The native cryptographically-secure fungible protocol token of TaleX (ticker symbol $X) is a transferable representation of attributed utility functions specified in the protocol of TaleX, and which is designed to be used solely as an interoperable utility token thereon. $X is a functional multi-utility token which will be used as a unit of account and economic incentive which will be distributed to encourage users to exert efforts towards contribution and participation in the ecosystem on TaleX, thereby creating a mutually beneficial system where every participant is fairly compensated for its efforts. $X is an integral and indispensable part of TaleX, because without $X, there would be no incentive for users to expend resources to participate in activities or provide services for the benefit of the ecosystem. Given that additional $X will be awarded to a user based only on its actual usage, activity and efforts made on TaleX and/or proportionate to the frequency and volume of transactions, users of TaleX and/or holders of $X which did not actively participate will not receive any $X incentives.
